reviewText: This is one of the best reports I've seen in years.  It's too bad that the only seller has chosen to make it $75 though!  As soon as amazon brings it in for a reasonable price, I'll buy it immediately!

This is a fantastic video! John Stossel did a great job on this.  Anyone interested in politics or promoting a better educational system for the USA and American kids needs to watch this! You especially need to watch this if you are looking for a good school for your kids or are a future parent!
